name: Crashland Adventure
description:
Crushland Adventure

I have always wanted to make a little story game, but I never knew in what atmosphere it should play.

With the help of your talking spaceship, you have to explore the vast and increasingly heavy universe and fight against all kinds of dangers!

            

There are 7 different planets to land and interact with. The further away you are from your spaceship, the more souls you can mine from planets! Larger planets, of course, also contain more.

Dangers can be encountered anywhere! Meteorites are annoying, but not the only danger that awaits you! Always be on your guard and don't overlook any small things!

I would definitely recommend playing with headphones and on full screen to get the best gaming experience.

A huge shoutout to https://itch.io/profile/fardifferent, the music is just awesome!

Exceptionally, the download for this game is available to everyone for free on  my https://www.patreon.com/maelvomen page!
